name: BurgerMancer - Endless Mode
description:
THE MODERATLEY LONG AWITED FOLLOWUP TO.... BURGERMANCER

help liam survive BABY MAMA's endless order from heck!!!!!! stack as high as you can before BABY MAMA and her legion of heck-spawn ruin the order!!!

The game gets progressively more difficult the more burger ingredients stacked.

 CREDITS

Bob - Art

Falco - Programming
